p: The MRC/UVRI and LSHTM Uganda Research Unit (MRC) conducted several population-based cross-sectional surveys in HIV-1 high-risk and general population groups in central and southwestern Uganda [ 29, 32, 33, 34, 35, 36]. In this analysis, we combined data collected from several populations surveyed between August 2014 and August 2017. Figure 1 below shows a map of the study sites.
